description: The module's display name.  This is the name displayed in the [Manage Extensions Modal](docs://Modal Views/Manage Extensions Modal).
`MM/DD/YYYY` date string corresponding to when the module was initially released.
`MM/DD/YYYY` date string corresponding to when the module was last updated.
**Optional** array of the module `id` strings which your module requires to function properly.
**Optional** string specifying the module loader your module should be loaded with.  If omitted the [default module loader](docs://Modules/Standard Modules) will be used.
**Optional** boolean specifying whether or not the module can be hot loaded.  Hot loading is when a module is loaded after zEdit has started.  Modules cannot be hot loaded if they use `ngapp`.
